oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: What Maidens (and young men) must not say or do, to avoid the wrath of the Water. By Dia!kwain (L V.-6. 4377 rev.-4407 rev.). Girls and youths and the rain: what they are taught and what they must do, eat and avoid. 1) Date on p.4385v: 16 March; p.4405v: 17 March, 2) This story is found in Book V-6.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Things girls and youths must avoid (the rain's things)
